original_title: Report of the Presidential Commission on Easter Attacks presented to the Catholic Bishops’ Conference.
original_body_lines: Minister of Public Security Tiran Alles has handed over the completed report of the Presidential Commission which investigated the 2019 April 21st Terror Attacks to the Catholic Bishops' Conference.
relevant report was handed over to the Bishop of Kurunegala, President of the Catholic Bishops' Conference, His eminence Harold Anthony.
report of the Presidential Commission was handed over to the Catholic Bishops' Conference with the President's approval.
Anti Terrorism Bill: Certain provisions in the bill violate Fundamental Rights – BASL
